attributes.action: National vote to revert 20mph speed limits
attributes.additional_details:
This majour cha ge was not vited for and the general public were not informed about the changes and the negative impacts this would have. 

The changes implemented are an excessive use of power without public consent.
attributes.background: Scrap and revert all new 20mph speed limits introduced on the 17th September 2023

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government and Welsh Parliament is responsible for.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
